fields.description: Current phase of development of the version.
URL for the resource representing the version creator
The username who last updated the version
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The source type of the version
The name of the version
The distribution of the version.
Time/Date the version was released
Pertinent comments or notes associated with the version
The combination of licenses to assign to the component version
The relation of contained licenses. Possible Values: [CONJUNCTIVE, DISJUNCTIVE]
Related licenses which follow the same structure as the license field
URL to the representation of the license to assign
The name of the license
A summary of the license family
The name of the license family
URL to the representation of the license family
Related licenses which follow the same structure as the license field
The display status of the collection of licenses
The date/time when the version was created
The username who created the version
An alternative commonly used name or alias for the project version
Time/Date the version was last updated
URL for the resource representing the user who last updated the version

links.description: Resource representing the license report of the version
Resource representing the risk profile of the version
Resource representing the <<bill-of-materials, Bill of Materials>> within the version
Resource representing the hierarchical-components within the version
Resource representing the vulnerable components within the version
Resource representing the project the version is within
Resource representing the custom fields used within the version
Resource representing the policy status of the version
Resource representing the attachments within the version
Resource representing the code locations used within the version
Resource representing the journal of the project version
Resource representing the issues associated with components used within the version
